description: Engineering components for code insights, architecture, and documentation

AppEngDashboard.description: Central application engineering dashboard with navigation and content areas.

AppEngNav.description: Navigation sidebar for code intelligence sections.

HealthSummaryBar.description: Codebase health summary bar with key metrics.

CodebaseHealth.description: Overall codebase health assessment with detailed scores.

HealthOverview.description: High-level health overview with score breakdown.

HealthMetric.description: A single health metric with trend.

InsightPanel.description: Panel showing code insights and recommendations.

CodeInsight.description: An insight about the codebase with recommendation.

TechDebtItem.description: A technical debt item requiring attention.

ModuleCard.description: Summary of a code module with metrics.

RefactoringHub.description: Hub for refactoring guidance and tools.

RefactoringStep.description: A single step in a refactoring guide.

ArchDashboard.description: Central architecture dashboard with diagrams, decisions, and patterns.

ArchHealthSummary.description: Architecture health summary with key metrics.

ArchitectureDiagram.description: Visual architecture diagram showing system components and their relationships.

DiagramCard.description: Card representing a diagram for listing views.

DiagramList.description: List of architecture diagrams with filtering.

DiagramLayer.description: A layer in a multi-layer diagram.

ComponentCard.description: A card representing a system component with its responsibilities and interfaces.

ComponentDetails.description: Detailed view of a system component.

DecisionRecord.description: Architecture Decision Record (ADR) showing context, decision, and consequences.

DecisionCard.description: Compact decision card for listing views.

DecisionList.description: List of architecture decisions with filtering.

AppengPatternCard.description: A detected code pattern with usage locations.

ArchPatternCard.description: An architecture pattern with description and when to use it.

ArchPatternDetails.description: Detailed pattern view with examples and implementations.

PatternImplementation.description: An implementation of a pattern in the codebase.

APIContract.description: API contract definition showing endpoints, methods, and schemas.

APIExplorer.description: Interactive API explorer for testing endpoints.

DataModel.description: Data model showing entities and their relationships.

DataEntity.description: A data entity with attributes and relationships.

DataModelCard.description: Compact data model card for listing.

TradeoffMatrix.description: Matrix comparing options across multiple criteria.

TradeoffAnalysis.description: Full trade-off analysis with matrix and recommendations.

TechStackCard.description: Technology stack summary showing languages, frameworks, and tools.

TechRadar.description: Technology radar showing tech adoption stages.

TechRadarItem.description: An item on the technology radar.

IntegrationMap.description: Map showing system integrations and data flows.

DocsDashboard.description: Central documentation management dashboard with navigation, coverage, and activity.

DocsNav.description: Documentation navigation with sections and filters.

DocsSummaryBar.description: Summary bar showing documentation health metrics.

CoverageOverview.description: Documentation coverage overview with breakdown by type.

CoverageBreakdown.description: Breakdown of coverage by module or area.

CoverageItem.description: Coverage status for a module or documentation area.

CoverageGap.description: A documentation coverage gap to address.

SyncIssueList.description: List of sync issues to resolve.

SyncIssueDetails.description: Detailed view of a sync issue with diff.

DocBrowser.description: Documentation browser with tree view and search.

DocTreeNode.description: A node in the documentation tree.

APIBrowser.description: API documentation browser with endpoint navigation.

APIModuleCard.description: API module card with coverage info.

APIModuleDetails.description: Detailed view of an API module.

ArchAPIEndpoint.description: A single API endpoint with method, path, and schema.

GenerationTaskDetails.description: Detailed view of a generation task.

DocsQuickActions.description: Quick action buttons for documentation tasks.

appeng-show-insight-details.description: Show detailed insight with code context

arch-show-architecture.description: Show system architecture diagram and components

arch-show-components.description: Show system components and their details

arch-show-tradeoffs.description: Show trade-off analysis for a decision
